message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 91498.88 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, so this is the value I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91498.88'}}
```
